description_lang.es: Envia, lee, responde correos y gestiona tu casilla de Outlook.
description_lang.en: Send, read, reply to emails and manage your Outlook mailbox.
description_lang.pr: Envie, leia, responda e-mails e gerencie sua caixa de correio do Outlook.

description.es: Si se marca esta casilla, evita la conexión IMAP.
description.en: If this box is marked, it avoids IMAP connection.
